en.title: Advanced NLP with spaCy
en.description: spaCy is a modern Python library for industrial-strength Natural Language Processing. In this free and interactive online course, you'll learn how to use spaCy to build advanced natural language understanding systems, using both rule-based and machine learning approaches.
en.bio: I'm Ines, one of the core developers of spaCy and the co-founder of Explosion. I specialize in modern developer tools for AI, Machine Learning and NLP. I also really love building stuff for the web.
